name: Spirit Stance
entries: At 3rd level, you can enter various stances to augment your combat. As a Bonus Action, you can enter a stance. A Stance ends after a minute without taking or dealing damage. Once per turn on your turn, you can expend one Ki point to enter a stance or switch your stance as a Free Action.

entries.name: Hunter Stance
entries: Your first attack you make each turn has advantage.Creatures have disadvantage on Opportunity attacks made against you when you move out of their reach.

entries.name: Graceful Stance
entries: You gain a bonus to your Dexterity Saving Throws equal to your Wisdom Modifier. When Dodging, you can add your proficiency Bonus to your Armor Class.

entries.name: Titan Stance
entries: Once per turn, when dealing damage to a creature with an unarmed strike or a Monk weapon, you can force that creature to make a Wisdom Saving Throw against your Monk DC, and on a fail, they are frightened of you until the end of their next turn.
